main event: An unidentified flying object was reported over Vandenberg Air Force Base on July 13, 1963.
interesting points: The object was bright and stationary at 5 feet elevation,The observer watched the object from a stopped car for 10 minutes,The object was not detected by local radar 30 minutes later,The object was described as egg-shaped, nickel in color, and approximately 5 feet in size,The Navy considered the report to be insignificant.
witness description: civilian observer watching from a stopped car
